Blog.post: practice this morning was interesting..really easy..got krispy kremes after too..so that was all good.. haha..work was a lot less boring then usual....always a plus..i'm ready for work and swimming to all be over and i can just enjoy the rest of my summer..o wait..by that time summer will be over..just my luck..well i guess with no swimming..work is only 1/2 of my life.. wat else to write?..hm o last nite watched starsky and hutch..that was preety funny..god though i need to go out..i haven't had any real fun in weeks...AHHHH!!!...that's it for now i guess...

its been a blah day.. didn't go anywhere or do anything..i think i need a day like that every once and awhile..i duno..tommrow will hopefully be my last really early swim practice for awhile..which means i finally can go out..:) ..practice shouldn't be too bad..we get to practice over at highland..which should be interesting..just remeber jo..if u feel like ur in the middle of nowhere..u are in the right place..okay well im going to go figure out wat i'm doing tonite.. probly nothing..but i mine as well try and do sumthing..

first entry woo hoo...yeah i stole this from kay..and jo..thanks guys..so wat did i do today..i..did wat a i do everyday of my life..got up and swam..wat a blast..it wasn't too bad cause we are tapering..but anything that uses engery is never a good thing..haha..no work today..so i get to hang out..with my sisters..: ) (sarcasim)..thats all for now i guess..

i'm getting really bad at this...i havent updated in awhile..but i don't think everyone wants to hear every little thing i do in my life..so i'll just talk about yesterday..i went to my LAST swim practice..definatly this time..haha.. then for sum reason..even though it was downpouring...my manager made me go into work..i stayed there from 11 - 3 ..and it got nice at 3..but she told me to go home ?...strange girl...i watched the olympics and stuff..micheal phelps lost.: /..but i'm not even going to start to talk about swimming..i need to get far far away from the sport..haha..okay well that's it..

i haven't updated this for awhile..and i really don't feel like writing all the stuff i have been doing since then..as you can tell i'm in a bad mood..i don't know why..but i just feel really annoyed about everything..i duno..i think it might be because everytime i go into a store..all i see is BACK TO SCHOOl..stuff..and that makes me want to cry.. i have sooooo much to do before school starts ..: / ....and..i am having a hard time accpeting the fact that I'm going to be a junior..that seems so old to me..i have to look at colleges..wow...scary scary stuff..iight that is it for now.. Y sam

wow penn state was amazing....i won't go through every part of the trip..we went to all the different buildings on the campus..and i went to this place called the Creamary where they make there own ice cream..it was good stuff too.. wat else..we looked at all small shops that was cool..and stayed at my cousin's house..which was really cute..yeah so that was the condensed version. . . now today..im hoping my mom can take me down to avalon so i can surf and go to the life guard races there tonite..okay well thats it

well i realized after i read the entry i put in yesterday..that i didn't put in anything that i had done yesterday..cause i'm sure everyone cares about wat i do everyday of my life.. i'm bored..so i guess i'll put it in.. yesterday..got up didn't feel good so i missed swimming..for the first time..in much too long.. then went to the beach in longport..that was fun..awesome surf.. then came home..and hung out..wat a day.. now i have to clean my room..and pack..penn state tommrow..: )....later...

thank you andrew haha.. i can go to penn state this weekend with my aunt and cousin..im really happy ..i didnt think i was gona be able to go cause of work..but its all good now..laura can do my job for me..haha..so i'm leaving thursday..staying at my aunts..then driving up friday morning..and staying over..till saturday..then family party on sunday..wow..wat a weekend..woo hoo..i can't wait..that's it for now..

had quite a boring day..went to practice..then went straight to work..nothing really interesting happened..played cards with everyone..kieth tought me how to play volleyball..woo hoo.. haha..i still stink at it...hm wat else?..yeah i think that is it..

i hate teachers and school hasn't even started back up yet..i have 5 books to read this summer and i am done 1 of them...it is never ending...who wants to read over summer?! not me!..oo well..okay so wat did i do today..um..i swam for like an hour today cause we got evacuated from the pool..cause of the fire alarms..which was good..haha..then i had to ride my bike to work..just a little embarrising wen i am working with people that can all drive themselves there..man..i can't wait till i can drive..nothing real interesting happened at work.. except that i have realized andrew loves to make fun of me.. guess it isn't to hard..hahah..got home from work..decided it would be a good nite for a run..so i went for like a 3 mile run..got out all my stress..now i am all good..haha..later.

went to spiderman 2 last nite..that was good..go get em' tiger. was my favorite line hahah..went to the mall with julie and laura..got sum stuff at american eagle..yet again blowing my pay check..its so hard to have money and not spend it!..we went to olive garden after..which was my first time there..amazing food ..wow..then we went out on their uncle's boat..which was awesome..we did sum big bertha tubing..almost like killed myself flipping of the raft..but it was worth it..now i'm finally.. home..eating dinner at 8:30..haha..that's it i guess..
